seo.title: Digital concierge (recommendations + bookings)
seo.description: Use Hostel Brikette’s digital concierge for quick local recommendations, transport updates, and help booking experiences—especially when plans change.

intro: This is for plans that work today—not generic lists.
Send your time window, budget, and priority. Put your deadline on the first line.

sections.title: How to access it
body: Ask reception for the latest contact/QR and the best channel (usually WhatsApp).
Include: dates, starting point, time window, budget, and #1 priority.

sections.title: Copy/paste template
body: “We have 6 hours, no car, we want (A) a swim + (B) sunset, budget €40 per person. What’s the simplest plan and the Plan B if ferries are cancelled?”
Budget baseline: %LINK:positanoBudget|Positano on a budget% + %LINK:terraceSunsets|Terrace sunset%.
If transport is sensitive: %LINK:ferryCancellations|ferry cancellations + weather%.

fallback: Digital concierge: quick recommendations, transport updates, and booking help.
